gallery.title: Professional CV Templates
gallery.subtitle: Choose from our curated collection of ATS-optimized templates designed for every industry
gallery.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search or filters

tech-modern-developer.name: Modern Developer
tech-modern-developer.description: Clean, professional template perfect for software developers and engineers. Features a modern two-column layout with prominent skills section.
tips: Highlight your tech stack prominently in the skills section
Include links to GitHub and portfolio projects
Quantify achievements with metrics (performance improvements, users served)

tech-full-stack.name: Full Stack Pro
tech-full-stack.description: Comprehensive layout to showcase front-end and back-end expertise. Perfect for developers who work across the entire stack.
tips: Balance frontend and backend skills equally
Include both technologies and frameworks
Add links to live projects or demos

tech-data-scientist.name: Data Scientist Elite
tech-data-scientist.description: Highlight your data analysis, ML expertise, and research publications. Designed for data professionals.
tips: List publications and research papers prominently
Include specific ML/AI frameworks and tools
Quantify impact of your models (accuracy, business value)

tech-devops-engineer.name: DevOps Specialist
tech-devops-engineer.description: Perfect for DevOps, SRE, and Cloud Engineers. Emphasizes infrastructure, automation, and CI/CD expertise.
tips: List AWS/GCP/Azure certifications prominently
Include specific tools: Terraform, Ansible, Jenkins
Quantify improvements (uptime, deployment frequency)

tech-ui-ux-designer.name: UI/UX Designer
tech-ui-ux-designer.description: Beautiful portfolio-style CV for designers. Balances creativity with ATS compatibility.
tips: Include links to your design portfolio
Showcase your design process, not just outputs
List design tools: Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD

business-executive.name: Executive Professional
business-executive.description: Premium template for C-level and senior executives. Clean, authoritative design that commands attention.
tips: Lead with strategic impact, not daily tasks
Include board positions and advisory roles
Quantify P&L responsibility and team sizes

business-manager.name: Modern Manager
business-manager.description: Ideal for project managers and team leaders. Highlights leadership, KPIs, and team achievements.
tips: Quantify team sizes and budget responsibility
List relevant certifications (PMP, Scrum Master)
Include key metrics and KPIs achieved

business-consultant.name: Strategy Consultant
business-consultant.description: Perfect for consultants and business analysts. Showcases client work and consulting frameworks.
tips: Describe client engagements with impact metrics
List industries served and consulting methodologies
Highlight prestigious client logos (if allowed)

business-sales.name: Sales Champion
business-sales.description: Highlight your sales achievements and targets exceeded. Numbers-focused layout for sales professionals.
tips: Lead with revenue numbers and quota attainment
Include deal sizes and win rates
List major accounts closed

creative-graphic-designer.name: Creative Designer
creative-graphic-designer.description: Bold and colorful template for graphic designers. Showcases creativity while remaining professional.
tips: Include a link to your online portfolio
List design software proficiencies
Showcase award-winning work

creative-marketing.name: Marketing Specialist
creative-marketing.description: Dynamic template for marketing professionals. Highlights campaigns, ROI, and social media stats.
tips: Quantify campaign results (engagement, conversions, ROI)
List marketing tools and platforms
Include relevant certifications (Google Ads, HubSpot)

medical-doctor.name: Medical Professional
medical-doctor.description: Professional template for doctors and physicians. Emphasizes credentials, specializations, and clinical experience.
tips: List all medical licenses and board certifications
Include research publications and presentations
Highlight clinical hours and patient volumes
